Coffee Break: I'm going to take a break
On first witnessing utility monster: Ho, what is this ? A new victim
comment_on_choice: Choo Choo little train, make a choice !
Omg, go ahead, do the moral choice

lvl_1: Good, one person is worth less than five
lvl_2: Good, a baby has more worth, it will live longer
Wrong, a baby is worth more, it will live longer.
lvl_3: Again, old dude or just a guy ?
Good, a random old man is worth less. It was already kind of dead.
Wrong, do you really think this old man ahs any worth ? He is probably dead in a few years.
lvl_4: Of course rich guy is worth more, who do you think paid for you ?
Are you out of your mind, that rich guy paid for your existence !
lvl_5: Finaly, bad guy or old dude ?
Great, this guy had a negative value. The world is better without him
You have to much hope in humanity, this guy would steal the rich guy money if he had the chance

tutorial_outro: You know what you need to know
